mesquite.lib.table

Class TableTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.MesquiteTool
      • mesquite.lib.table.TableTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, Explainable, ImageOwner, Listable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlignTool, MultiBlockSplitter.MultiBlockTool, ScrollToData.ScrollToDataTool, SelectedBlockMover.SelectedBlockTool

    public class TableTool
extends MesquiteTool
    This subclass of MesquiteTool is used in data windows for manipulating data.
